title: Spotify
description: A Spotify clone with complete functionality, developed using Next.js, Node.js, React.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and Tailwind CSS. It replicates the core features of the Spotify platform, create playlists, discover new releases, and manage their music libraries.

title: Crud-App
description: A CRUD application equipped with a Mock API, built using Next.js, React.js, Tailwind CSS, Node.js. It empowers users to perform CRUD operations on data, including features such as pagination, search functionality, error handling, and responsive design.

title: Amazon
description: The Amazon clone with full is a e-commerce platform developed using React.js, Next.js, MongoDB, Express.js, Node.js, and Tailwind CSS. It mimics the features of the Amazon website, add them to cart, make purchases, and manage their orders.

title: Travel Agency
description: The Amazon clone with full is a e-commerce platform developed using React.js, Next.js, MongoDB, Express.js, Node.js, and Tailwind CSS. It mimics the features of the Amazon website, add them to cart, make purchases, and manage their orders.
